thread.title: Southern Rail could be nationalised in wake of strikes
thread.title_full: Southern Rail could be nationalised in wake of strikes

title: Southern Rail could be nationalised in wake of strikes
text: Southern Rail could be nationalised in the wake of strike chaos: Temporary takeover is being considered in attempt to tackle crippling delays The radical plans being drawn up in Whitehall emerged after months of strikes An internal investigation is to decide whether Southern breached its contract Officials are preparing a number of options if it is found in breach, including splitting off Southern from the company that runs it, Govia Thameslink Railway Last night the DfT said there were no plans to strip Govia of its franchise Published: 00:25 GMT, 26 January 2017 | Updated: 00:25 GMT, 26 January 2017 26 shares
